summary: The diff modifies backend/main.mo and several frontend files. The backend changes appear to address REQ-1 (actor method correctness). Frontend changes touch App.tsx (REQ-4), useQueries.ts (REQ-2), and CasesListView.tsx (REQ-3). However, DashboardView.tsx is not modified per the diff, meaning REQ-3's requirement to audit and fix the Dashboard page for loading/error states and blank-page prevention is not evidenced. The frontend-file-summaries.txt describes useQueries.ts changes but does not include an entry for DashboardView.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit DashboardView.tsx to ensure it correctly consumes React Query hooks, handles loading and error states, and never renders a blank page when data is unavailable. Add or fix error boundary/fallback UI for fetch failures.
missing_requirements.reason: DashboardView.tsx does not appear in the modified files list and has no entry in frontend-file-summaries.txt, indicating it was not changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of a 'Follow Up' checklist task with aqua color #06B6D4 and defaultSelected=true
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly lists adding new features unrelated to the fetch failure as a non-goal. Adding a new Follow Up task item is a feature addition unrelated to diagnosing or fixing the blank page.

hallucinated_features.description: CaseCard updated with new species icons and a new showPresentingComplaintCollapsed prop
hallucinated_features.reason: These are UI changes unrelated to the fetch failure fix, which is explicitly a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: CasesListView toolbar sticky offset changed to top-14 and highlight prop renamed to isHighlighted
hallucinated_features.reason: Sticky toolbar offset and prop renaming are layout/UI changes unrelated to the blank page or fetch failure diagnosis, falling under the non-goal of redesigning the Cases layout.
